title: Introducing OpenAI London
summary: OpenAI has announced the opening of its first international office in London, as part of its commitment to expanding its operations and bringing in diverse perspectives. The London office will focus on research, engineering, and go-to-market functions, as well as collaborating with local communities and policymakers. OpenAI sees this expansion as an opportunity to attract top talent and drive innovation in artificial general intelligence (AGI) development and policy.
